phrases: This place is full of people today.
The New Year's right after Christmas.
No, I received them during my daily shopping here at the shopping district.

Grand Prize Pair of Hot Springs Trip Tickets 1st Prize Big Screen TV 2nd Prize Cleaning Robot 3rd Prize Warm Kotatsu 4th Prize Y10,000 Oborozuka Shopping District Voucher 5th Prize Y5,000 Oborozuka Shopping District Voucher 6th Prize Y1,000 Oborozuka Shopping District Voucher

Grand Prize Pair of Hot Springs Trip Tickets 1st Prize Big Screen TV 2nd Prize Cleaning Robot 3rd Prize Warm Kotatsu 4th Prize Y10,000 Oborozuka Shopping District Voucher 5th Prize Y5,000 Oborozuka Shopping District Voucher
Grand Prize Pair of Hot Springs Trip Tickets 1st Prize Big Screen TV 2nd Prize Cleaning Robot 3rd Prize Warm Kotatsu 4th Prize Y10,000 Oborozuka Shopping District Voucher
Grand Prize Pair of Hot Springs Trip Tickets 1st Prize Big Screen TV 2nd Prize Cleaning Robot 3rd Prize Warm Kotatsu
The grand prize is a hot springs vacation, huh?
I will land the hot springs!
You will be set for the cold winter with this.
You have won a warm kotatsu.
Home to my family in Hokkaido.
I will buy you some nama chocolates as souvenirs.
I have Winter Comiket at the end of the year.
A lot of stuff happened this year.
This year's work is finally over.
Kobayashi, do you have to go to work anymore?
I am off until the third.
You are always so busy, so please take it easy over the holidays.
I am glad we won the kotatsu.
I need to start preparing the New Year's dishes soon.
I even borrowed the tools to pound mochi and soba.
You do not have to go that all-out.
It is a maid's responsibility to take charge and make sure
the seasonal events are carried out.
Oh, do you need to use the restroom?
Oh well, guess I will go.
Oh, Miss Kobayashi, could you hit the switch on the rice cooker?
The New Year's parlor trick tournament will be on January 3rd.
You can look forward to several outstanding guests performing in our competition!
Our huge New Year's bargain sale starts soon!
So I can just pound the New Year's soba tomorrow before we eat it, then?
Tohru, is not this a lot of work for you?
No, these are my natural duties as a maid.
Hmm, but I feel like we are forgetting something.
Tohru, they are calling for you.
Umm, I made too much candied sweet potatoes with chestnuts.
Have some if you would like.
Well, we did not make any of those.
Oh, hold on one moment, please.
Here is some mochi we pounded.
If you put it in your freezer you can keep it from molding.
I got a lot of mandarin oranges from my home.
Please take some of our mochi.
Going by the pattern thus far, as soon as I climb under again...
I will put it on display right away.
Here is some of the mochi we made.
Well, we received this from Mr. Sone.
There are twelve animals in the Chinese zodiac.
It came up when I was searching the net for all things New Year.
But I still cannot accept it.
Well, they say the order of the animals was decided by who
reached God fastest on the morning of the new year, right?
Oh, yeah, there is that story.
The Rat stole first place by hopping a ride on the Ox.
What is it that you cannot you accept?
It is impossible for a dragon to come after an Ox or Tiger, let alone a Rabbit!
I cannot accept it at all!
Well, it is just a story.
Oh, this mandarin orange is sweet.
For getting along with the neighbors, and everything else you have done...
I thought I was forgetting something.
I have not written one of these in years.
How do you feel about your first performance on the show?
Well, I wrote my lyrics down on my hand so I would not forget them,
I had the noodle shop owner in the shopping district teach me the trick.
but my palms are so sweaty they have all disappeared.
Apparently she promised to join Miss Saikawa on her first shrine visit.
She lent me a kimono so we can wear them together.
That is like a magic trick.
A long time ago my mother taught me the trick.
You want to wear one, too, then, Tohru?
I am glad my kimono fits you.
With a kimono, you can adjust the size for the chest, too!
These past few days we have been losing to the temptation of the kotatsu,
but going outside for a change is nice.
I ran into Elma over there.
I heard you could eat lots of unusual food here.
Lucoa-san, what is with your kimono?
What is your idea of traditional?
Oh, that looks good on you, Mr. Fafnir.
I used to drink something like this often.
Oh, and because you got drunk you and your sister
One I made would work way better.
You do not need any charms, Shouta?
I am from a family of mages.
I will achieve my desires myself!
It might be useful for researching new curses.
You are as popular as ever, huh.
Looks like Faf-kun's Curse Anthology 2 did not sell any though.
He produced a second after the first did not sell this summer?
Fortune Telling Number Twelve Great Blessing Luck
It is a blessing too great for a maid.
You should have it, young lady.
It is your luck, Sis... Georgie.
Fortune Telling Number Twelve Great Curse Luck
This is my first time seeing it.
The one you wait for will come.
That which you have lost, will not be found.
I do not really get, but it sounds like a great curse.
Though I guess it also means things'll only get better from here.
Hey, is not it almost time?
I wonder what is going on.
Time sure flew by, did not it?
Happy New Year to you, too!
May Dad's lower back get a little better.
May I become great at soccer
Young lady, are you all right?
I am just a little cold.
Kobayashi, can I invite Saikawa over?
Since it is warm under the kotatsu.
Why do not we take this chance to invite everyone over?
We have plenty of food, too.
We should let Saikawa-san's and Shouta-kun's families know.
Well then, everyone, let us go!
Here is the ozouni soup, everyone.
You do not have to eat it if you do not want to.
Tohru and Kanna made the mochi.
Well, since you made it, I will eat it for you.
I learned the seasoning from Miss Kobayashi's family.
I will make some sweet red bean soup later, too.
You get a special treat, Miss Kobayashi!
I have told you countless times not to put in your tail.
But it is about time you tried it, is not it?
It is a new year after all.
It still will not happen next year or the year after.
Maybe we will buy one, too.
I got to see the first sunrise of the year with Kanna-san, so this should be a good year.
The first sunrise of the year is special.
Now, every year on January 2nd, it is the annual Tokyo Bay Ekiden!
Which team will win today's race to Nagaura?
That is on break until the new year's over.
Well, I understand how you feel.
I cannot step away right now.
It is closer to you, is not it?
Now, today's Tokyo Bay Ekiden, on January 3rd.
The contenders for the win have been narrowed down to two teams!
Are these people running the same race as yesterday?
No, today they are running back from Nagaura.
First writing of the year, huh?
I got your New Year's card today.
Oh, I guess it did not make it for the 1st, huh?
It is the first time you have ever sent a card.
We are well, we are well.
So you are having fun, then?
It is fine to keep going.
She said all my folks are doing well.
Miss Kobayashi, you were not going to see your family even for New Year's?
Every year, I spend New Year's sleeping off the year's fatigue.
It is not like I am on bad terms with my family.
Occasionally we chat on the phone.
Is that how it is with human families?
I think it is different for everyone.
In my case, living over here is the life I have grown used to.
You could go back if you wanted to, right?
You are not going to go see them?
Living here with you is my life now, Miss Kobayashi.
It went in nicely that time.
It is my first time receiving any.
It is my first time giving any, as well.
I am going to have a good first dream.
Lady Elma, I received New Year's money from Kobayashi.
I received New Year's money from Kobayashi.
I will give you one, too.
(We are Raising The Bar On Ourselves)
